Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to an obstruction on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to an obstruction on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
